column5: This beautiful apartment is located in a green and quite area inside Alamo Heights of San Antonio, right behind the Botanical Gardens. Apartment is walking distance to the Zoo, Brackenridge Park, San Antonio Country Club and only 5 mins drive to Downtown. It is remodeled with wood and tile floors, ceiling fans in all rooms, custom all tile shower and custom tub/tile shower, granite counter tops with stainless steel under mount sinks. Outside there are fruit trees and lots of parking space
